sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-carousel v-model="activeIndex" hide-delimiters>
    <v-carousel-item v-for="(item, index) in images" :key="index">
      <v-img :src="item.src" :alt="item.alt"></v-img>
    </v-carousel-item>
  </v-carousel>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      activeIndex: 0,
      images: [
        { src: 'https://example.com/image1.jpg', alt: 'Image 1' },
        { src: 'https://example.com/image2.jpg', alt: 'Image 2' },
        { src: 'https://example.com/image3.jpg', alt: 'Image 3' },
      ],
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-carousel .v-carousel-item .v-image__image {
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.v-carousel .v-carousel-item:hover .v-image__image {
  opacity: 1;
}

.v-carousel .v-carousel-item:hover ~ .v-delimiter {
  opacity: 1;
}

.v-carousel .v-delimiter {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
  z-index: 1;
}

.v-carousel .v-delimiter img {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  margin: 0 4px;
  opacity: 0.5;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
}

.v-carousel .v-delimiter img:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}
</style>
